    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeaterUserJava4InboundPort

    public class HeaterUserInboundPort
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
implements HeaterUserCI
    The class HeaterUserInboundPort implements an inbound port for the HeaterUserCI component interface.

      • setCurrentPowerLevel

        public void setCurrentPowerLevel(Measure<java.lang.Double> powerLevel)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: HeaterExternalControlI
        set the power level of the heater; if powerLevel.getData() > getMaxPowerLevel().getData() then set the power level to the maximum.

        Contract

         pre     on()
 pre     powerLevel != null && powerLevel.getData() >= 0.0 && powerLevel.getMeasurementUnit().equals(POWER_UNIT)
 post    powerLevel.getData() > getMaxPowerLevel().getData() || getCurrentPowerLevel().getData() == powerLevel.getData()
 post    powerLevel.getData() <= getMaxPowerLevel().getData() || getCurrentPowerLevel().getData() == Heater.MAX_POWER_LEVEL.getData()
        Specified by:
        setCurrentPowerLevel in interface HeaterExternalControlI
        Specified by:
